metadata.Title: CVE-2022-3265 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: A cross-site scripting issue has been discovered in GitLab CE/EE affectingall versions prior to 15.3.5, 15.4 prior to 15.4.4, and 15.5 prior to15.5.2. It was possible to exploit a vulnerability in setting the labelscolour feature which could lead to a stored XSS that allowed attackers toperform arbitrary actions on behalf of victims at client side.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
